item.title: Mike add a quote by Hannah Pittard
item.description: "Nora Lindell was gone. And, with Trey Stephens in jail, he was gone, too, in a way. By this time, we'd already lost Minka Dinnerman, as well (a car crash and cancer, respectively). It seemed, some days, that life was nothing more than a tally of the people who'd left us behind." -- Hannah Pittard

item.title: Mike add a quote by Hannah Pittard
item.description: "A great deal of tenderness, but it was the tenderness of a hospice nurse - of one committed to caring but too familiar with pain and parting to every truly or fully invest." -- Hannah Pittard

item.title: Mike add a quote by Hannah Pittard
item.description: "Words like lucky and advantages we knew, even at our young age, were upscale euphemisms for not poor, not the son of a drunk and, later, not the son of a suicidal mother." -- Hannah Pittard
